summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York for Ghislaine Maxwell, commanding law enforcement to arrest her. The warrant lists charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple federal offenses related to the enticement and transportation of minors, and perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. magistrate judge issued an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell based on an indictment, charging her with conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2020.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.
The charges against Maxwell include conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The case number is 20cr330, indicating it was filed in 2020.
The warrant is based on an indictment filed with the court.
